feed.title: Sushmey
feed.subtitle: Hi, I'm Sushmey! I'm a software developer with about 2 years of experience, currently working at Wells Fargo, building data processing platforms. I've worked with various technologies and frameworks such as Python, Java, SQL, Spark, Hive, Django, Express, etc. Previously, I interned at Barclays and have also contributed extensively to Zulip Terminal, an open-source terminal-based chat application. Let's get in touch, contact me at sushmeywork@gmail.com or slide into my Linkedin DMs!
